languages.text: {n}Мехадендриты техножрицы скрипуче склоняются перед вами.{/n} "Досточтим{mf|ый|ая} владыка судна, моя цель не навредить, а уберечь — я лишь забочусь о здоровье машинного духа. Недавно он заболел и стал еще более норовист, чем прежде. Если мирянка начнет его пытать, почтенный дух может оскорбиться и покинуть нас навсегда, забрав с собой благоговейные логи стараний мирян. Этого нельзя допустить!"

{n}Androveta-Phi's mechadendrites creak as they bow before you.{/n} "Exalted ruler of the vessel, I mean not to harm, but to protect — I merely care for the machine spirit's health. It has fallen ill of late, and now its temper is worse than ever. If the laywoman starts torturing it now, the venerable spirit may take offence and leave us forever, taking the logs of the laypeople's toils with it. This must be prevented!"
languages.original_text: {n}Мехадендриты техножрицы скрипуче склоняются перед вами.{/n} "Досточтим{mf|ый|ая} владыка судна, моя цель не навредить, а уберечь — я лишь забочусь о здоровье машинного духа. Недавно он заболел и стал еще более норовист, чем прежде. Если мирянка начнет его пытать, почтенный дух может оскорбиться и покинуть нас навсегда, забрав с собой благоговейные логи стараний мирян. Этого нельзя допустить!"

languages.text: {n}Les mécadendrites d'Androveta-Phi grincent alors qu'elles s'inclinent devant vous.{/n} « Auguste {mf|maître|maîtresse} de ce vaisseau, je ne pense pas à mal, mais l'état de santé de l'esprit de la machine me préoccupe. Il est tombé malade récemment, et son caractère s'en ressent plus que jamais. Si cette profane s'avise de le torturer dans les circonstances actuelles, cette vénérable entité risque d'en prendre ombrage et de nous abandonner pour toujours en emportant avec elle le registre du personnel. Nous devons tout faire pour éviter d'en arriver là ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi's mechadendrites creak as they bow before you.{/n} "Exalted ruler of the vessel, I mean not to harm, but to protect — I merely care for the machine spirit's health. It has fallen ill of late, and now its temper is worse than ever. If the laywoman starts torturing it now, the venerable spirit may take offence and leave us forever, taking the logs of the laypeople's toils with it. This must be prevented!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mécadendrites d'Androveta-Phi grincent alors qu'elles s'inclinent devant vous.{/n} « Auguste {mf|maître|maîtresse} de ce vaisseau, je ne pense pas à mal, mais l'état de santé de l'esprit de la machine me préoccupe. Il est tombé malade récemment, et son caractère s'en ressent plus que jamais. Si cette profane s'avise de le torturer dans les circonstances actuelles, cette vénérable entité risque d'en prendre ombrage et de nous abandonner pour toujours en emportant avec elle le registre du personnel. Nous devons tout faire pour éviter d'en arriver là ! »

languages.text: {n}Las mecadendritas de Androveta-Fi crujen al inclinarse ante ti.{/n} «Exaltad{mf|o|a} gobernante de la nave, no busco causar daño sino proteger. Me preocupa la salud del espíritu máquina. Hace poco enfermó y ahora su temperamento es peor que nunca. Si la laica empieza a torturarlo ahora, el venerable espíritu puede ofenderse y abandonarnos para siempre, llevándose consigo los registros de las labores de los laicos. ¡No podemos permitirlo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi's mechadendrites creak as they bow before you.{/n} "Exalted ruler of the vessel, I mean not to harm, but to protect — I merely care for the machine spirit's health. It has fallen ill of late, and now its temper is worse than ever. If the laywoman starts torturing it now, the venerable spirit may take offence and leave us forever, taking the logs of the laypeople's toils with it. This must be prevented!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mecadendritas de Androveta-Fi crujen al inclinarse ante ti.{/n} «Exaltad{mf|o|a} gobernante de la nave, no busco causar daño sino proteger. Me preocupa la salud del espíritu máquina. Hace poco enfermó y ahora su temperamento es peor que nunca. Si la laica empieza a torturarlo ahora, el venerable espíritu puede ofenderse y abandonarnos para siempre, llevándose consigo los registros de las labores de los laicos. ¡No podemos permitirlo!».

languages.text: {n}安多维塔-菲的机械触须咯吱作响，向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“尊贵的圣船统治者，我并没有打算阻挠您，我只是想保护这些机器——我很在意机魂近期的健康状况。它已经病了，脾气也变得更加暴躁。如果这个教外人士折磨它的话，可敬的机魂可能会感到冒犯，带着那些教外人士的工作日志彻底消失。我们必须预防这种情况！”
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi's mechadendrites creak as they bow before you.{/n} "Exalted ruler of the vessel, I mean not to harm, but to protect — I merely care for the machine spirit's health. It has fallen ill of late, and now its temper is worse than ever. If the laywoman starts torturing it now, the venerable spirit may take offence and leave us forever, taking the logs of the laypeople's toils with it. This must be prevented!"

traits.locale_text: {n}安多维塔-菲的机械触须咯吱作响，向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“尊贵的圣船统治者，我并没有打算阻挠您，我只是想保护这些机器——我很在意机魂近期的健康状况。它已经病了，脾气也变得更加暴躁。如果这个教外人士折磨它的话，可敬的机魂可能会感到冒犯，带着那些教外人士的工作日志彻底消失。我们必须预防这种情况！”

languages.text: {n}アンドロベータ・ファイの機械触手がきしみをあげながら、あなたの前でお辞儀をする。{/n}「エグザルテッド船の支配者よ、危害を加えるつもりはありませんが、守る意思はあります。私はただ、機械精霊の健康管理をしているだけです。歳をとって病気になって、機嫌も最悪なのです。もし、その無知な女が今それを拷問するのなら、崇高な機械精霊は不満に感じ、平民たちのログを持って永遠に私たちのもとを去ってしまうかもしれません。そのような状況は絶対に防ぐべきです！」
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi's mechadendrites creak as they bow before you.{/n} "Exalted ruler of the vessel, I mean not to harm, but to protect — I merely care for the machine spirit's health. It has fallen ill of late, and now its temper is worse than ever. If the laywoman starts torturing it now, the venerable spirit may take offence and leave us forever, taking the logs of the laypeople's toils with it. This must be prevented!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アンドロベータ・ファイの機械触手がきしみをあげながら、あなたの前でお辞儀をする。{/n}「エグザルテッド船の支配者よ、危害を加えるつもりはありませんが、守る意思はあります。私はただ、機械精霊の健康管理をしているだけです。歳をとって病気になって、機嫌も最悪なのです。もし、その無知な女が今それを拷問するのなら、崇高な機械精霊は不満に感じ、平民たちのログを持って永遠に私たちのもとを去ってしまうかもしれません。そのような状況は絶対に防ぐべきです！」

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Phis Mechadendriten knirschen, als er sich vor dir verbeugt.{/n} "{mf|Erhabener Herrscher|Erhabene Herrscherin} des Schiffs, ich möchte Euch nicht schaden, sondern beschützen ... mir liegt allein die Gesundheit des Maschinengeistes am Herzen. Er ist dieser Tage krank und seine Laune ist schlechter denn je. Wenn die Laiin nun beginnt, ihn zu foltern, könnte der ehrwürdige Geist das als Beleidigung betrachten und uns für immer verlassen, wobei er die Logs der Mühen der Laien mitnehmen würde. Das muss verhindert werden!"
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi's mechadendrites creak as they bow before you.{/n} "Exalted ruler of the vessel, I mean not to harm, but to protect — I merely care for the machine spirit's health. It has fallen ill of late, and now its temper is worse than ever. If the laywoman starts torturing it now, the venerable spirit may take offence and leave us forever, taking the logs of the laypeople's toils with it. This must be prevented!"

Das muss verhindert werden!"

languages.text: {n}Androveta-Fi'nin mekadentritleri, önünde eğilmesiyle birlikte çatırdıyor.{/n} "Geminin asil hükümdarı... Size zarar vermek değildir niyetim, sizi korumaktır. Yalnızca makine ruhunun sağlığıyla ilgileniyorum. Son zamanlarda hasta düştü, mizacı da hiç olmadığı kadar kötü. Avam kadını ona eziyet etmeye başlarsa muhterem ruh, bundan gocunup bizi ebediyen terk edebilir. Beraberinde avam tabakasının kayıtlarını da götürür. Bunun önüne geçmeliyiz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Androveta-Phi's mechadendrites creak as they bow before you.{/n} "Exalted ruler of the vessel, I mean not to harm, but to protect — I merely care for the machine spirit's health. It has fallen ill of late, and now its temper is worse than ever. If the laywoman starts torturing it now, the venerable spirit may take offence and leave us forever, taking the logs of the laypeople's toils with it. This must be prevented!"
